Headline: No trains at O'Hare Aiport
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended at O'Hare due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended at O'Hare due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between Rosemont and Forest Park at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Rosemont and O'Hare to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
